description: Years 2, 6, 10 and 12 will be the first to return, the education minister tells the House of Keys.
title: Coronavirus: Phased return of Manx schools to start on 22 June
title_page: Coronavirus: Phased return of Manx schools to start on 22 June - BBC News
maintext: "We won't actually understand what children have lost... in terms of their education, if anything, until we're able to get them back to schools," he said.
